Drop in relaxation session

Use this opportunity to practice most common relaxation exercises in a warm, supportive group atmosphere.


This week's topic: Gratitude and positive emotions

"Your experience of life is not based on what happens to you but on what you pay attention to" (Gregg Krech). This week we will consider how the things we choose to pay attention to change our mood and our perception of reality. We will focus on the importance of gratitude and positive emotions for a healthy and happy life. We will end the session with a guided imagery/gratitude exercise.
